response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe holds immense value for those who appreciate its unique features and benefits. Considering its quality and the effort put into creating it, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to experience something truly exceptional at a price that reflects its true worth. I trust that you will find the value proposition compelling. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your experience.", "product_price": 150}
